parameters.name: User
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" 
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName)
| where isnotempty(SourceUserName)
| distinct SourceUserName
| sort by SourceUserName asc

parameters.name: HostName
parameters.label: Host Name
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" 
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName), SourceHostName = trim(@"\s", SourceHostName)
| where isnotempty(SourceHostName) and (('{User:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
| distinct SourceHostName
| sort by SourceHostName desc

parameters.name: Asset
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" 
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName), DeviceName = trim(@"\s", DeviceName)
| where isnotempty(DeviceName) and (('{User:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
| distinct DeviceName
| sort by DeviceName desc

parameters.name: SLD
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" 
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName)
| where (('{User:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
| extend DestinationDnsDomain = trim_end(@'.',DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend domains = split(DestinationDnsDomain,'.')
| extend SecondLevelDomain =strcat(domains[-2],'.',domains[-1])
| extend SecondLevelDomain = trim(@"\s", SecondLevelDomain)
| where isnotempty(SecondLevelDomain)
| distinct SecondLevelDomain
| order by SecondLevelDomain

parameters.name: ResponseCode
parameters.label: Response Code
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" 
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" 
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSRCode: string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName), InfobloxDNSRCode = trim(@"\s", InfobloxDNSRCode)
| where isnotempty(InfobloxDNSRCode) and (('{User:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
| distinct InfobloxDNSRCode
| sort by InfobloxDNSRCode asc

parameters.name: RecordType
parameters.label: Record Type
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" 
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" 
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType: string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName), InfobloxDNSQType = trim(@"\s", InfobloxDNSQType)
| where isnotempty(InfobloxDNSQType) and (('{User:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
| distinct InfobloxDNSQType
| sort by InfobloxDNSQType asc

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" 
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" 
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxDNSRCode:string, InfobloxB1Region:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName), DeviceName = trim(@"\s", DeviceName), InfobloxDNSRCode = trim(@"\s", InfobloxDNSRCode), InfobloxDNSQType = trim(@"\s", InfobloxDNSQType), DestinationDnsDomain = trim(@"\s", DestinationDnsDomain), SourceHostName = trim(@"\s", SourceHostName)
| where (('{User:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
and (('{HostName:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceHostName in~ ({HostName}))
and (('{RecordType:escapjson}') == "*" or InfobloxDNSQType in~ ({RecordType}))
and (('{ResponseCode:escapjson}') == "*" or InfobloxDNSRCode in~ ({ResponseCode}))
and (('{Asset:escapjson}') == "*" or DeviceName in~ ({Asset}))
and isnotempty(DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend DestinationDnsDomain_ = trim_end(@'.',DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend domains = split(DestinationDnsDomain_,'.')
| extend SecondLevelDomain =strcat(domains[-2],'.',domains[-1])
| where (('{SLD:escapjson}') == "*" or SecondLevelDomain in~ ({SLD}))
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationDnsDomain
| project-rename ['Destination Dns Domain'] = DestinationDnsDomain
| project ['Destination Dns Domain'], Count
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Most Requested FQDNs

parameters.name: TopDevices
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" 
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" 
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| where DestinationDnsDomain == ('{DestinationDnsDomain}')
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxDNSRCode:string, InfobloxB1Region:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName), DeviceName = trim(@"\s", DeviceName), InfobloxDNSRCode = trim(@"\s", InfobloxDNSRCode), InfobloxDNSQType = trim(@"\s", InfobloxDNSQType), DestinationDnsDomain = trim(@"\s", DestinationDnsDomain), SourceHostName = trim(@"\s", SourceHostName)
| where (('{User:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
and (('{HostName:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceHostName in~ ({HostName}))
and (('{RecordType:escapjson}') == "*" or InfobloxDNSQType in~ ({RecordType}))
and (('{ResponseCode:escapjson}') == "*" or InfobloxDNSRCode in~ ({ResponseCode}))
and (('{Asset:escapjson}') == "*" or DeviceName in~ ({Asset}))
and isnotempty(DeviceName)
| summarize Count = count() by DeviceName
| top 10 by Count desc
| summarize DeviceList = make_list(DeviceName)

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" 
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"

| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxDNSRCode:string, InfobloxB1Region:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName), DeviceName = trim(@"\s", DeviceName), InfobloxDNSRCode = trim(@"\s", InfobloxDNSRCode), InfobloxDNSQType = trim(@"\s", InfobloxDNSQType), DestinationDnsDomain = trim(@"\s", DestinationDnsDomain), SourceHostName = trim(@"\s", SourceHostName)
| where (('{User:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" 
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" 
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxDNSRCode:string, InfobloxB1Region:string,
InfobloxDNSView:string, InfobloxDNSQClass:string, InfobloxDNSQFlags:string, InfobloxAnCount:string, InfobloxNsCount:string, 
InfobloxArCount:string, InfobloxB1ConnectionType:string, InfobloxB1OPHName:string, InfobloxB1OPHIPAddress:string, InfobloxB1Network:string, 
InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion:string, InfobloxB1DHCPFingerprint:string, InfobloxB1DNSTags:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName), DeviceName = trim(@"\s", DeviceName), InfobloxDNSRCode = trim(@"\s", InfobloxDNSRCode), InfobloxDNSQType = trim(@"\s", InfobloxDNSQType), DestinationDnsDomain = trim(@"\s", DestinationDnsDomain), SourceHostName = trim(@"\s", SourceHostName)
| where (('{HostName:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceHostName in~ ({HostName}))
and (('{RecordType:escapjson}') == "*" or InfobloxDNSQType in~ ({RecordType}))
and (('{ResponseCode:escapjson}') == "*" or InfobloxDNSRCode in~ ({ResponseCode}))
and (('{Asset:escapjson}') == "*" or DeviceName in~ ({Asset}))
and SourceUserName == ('{SourceUserName}')
| extend DestinationDnsDomain_ = trim_end(@'.',DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend domains = split(DestinationDnsDomain_,'.')
| extend SecondLevelDomain =strcat(domains[-2],'.',domains[-1])

content.query:
let Gridtimestring = tostring('{QPS_Time}');
let Gridtime = todatetime(substring(Gridtimestring, indexof(Gridtimestring, " "), indexof(Gridtimestring, "GMT") - 1 - indexof(Gridtimestring, " "))) -5h - 30m;

CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" 
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" 
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS" 
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxDNSRCode:string, InfobloxB1Region:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName), DeviceName = trim(@"\s", DeviceName), InfobloxDNSRCode = trim(@"\s", InfobloxDNSRCode), InfobloxDNSQType = trim(@"\s", InfobloxDNSQType), DestinationDnsDomain = trim(@"\s", DestinationDnsDomain), SourceHostName = trim(@"\s", SourceHostName)
| where (('{User:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
and (('{HostName:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceHostName in~ ({HostName}))
and (('{RecordType:escapjson}') == "*" or InfobloxDNSQType in~ ({RecordType}))
and (('{ResponseCode:escapjson}') == "*" or InfobloxDNSRCode in~ ({ResponseCode}))
and (('{Asset:escapjson}') == "*" or DeviceName in~ ({Asset}))
and isnotempty(InfobloxDNSRCode)
| extend DestinationDnsDomain_ = trim_end(@'.',DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend domains = split(DestinationDnsDomain_,'.')
| extend SecondLevelDomain =strcat(domains[-2],'.',domains[-1])
| where (('{SLD:escapjson}') == "*" or SecondLevelDomain in~ ({SLD}))
| where TimeGenerated between (Gridtime - 30m .. Gridtime + 30m)
| sort by TimeGenerated asc
| make-series Count = count() default = 0 on bin(TimeGenerated, 1m) from (Gridtime - 30m) to (Gridtime + 30m) step 1m by InfobloxDNSRCode

content.json: ðŸ“ ***Refresh the web page to fetch details of recently collected events***

This workbook depends on the **Infoblox-Get-IP-Space-Data** logic app which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.</br>
Please configure this logic app first and keep it enabled in order to use this workbook.

parameters.name: DHCPServer
parameters.label: DHCP Server
parameters.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, id_s: string, name_s: string) [];
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DHCP"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxHostID: string) with (kv_delimiter="=", pair_delimiter=";")
| extend InfobloxHostID = trim(@"\s", InfobloxHostID)
| where isnotempty(InfobloxHostID) 
| distinct InfobloxHostID
| sort by InfobloxHostID asc

parameters.name: HostName
parameters.label: Host Name
parameters.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, id_s: string, name_s: string) [];
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DHCP" 
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxHostID: string) with (kv_delimiter="=", pair_delimiter=";")
| extend SourceHostName = trim(@"\s", SourceHostName), InfobloxHostID = trim(@"\s", InfobloxHostID)
| where isnotempty(SourceHostName) and (('{DHCPServer:escapjson}') == "*" or InfobloxHostID in~ ({DHCPServer}))
| distinct SourceHostName
| sort by SourceHostName asc

parameters.name: MAC
parameters.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, id_s: string, name_s: string) [];
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DHCP"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxHostID: string) with (kv_delimiter="=", pair_delimiter=";")
| extend SourceMACAddress = trim(@"\s", SourceMACAddress), InfobloxHostID = trim(@"\s", InfobloxHostID)
| where isnotempty(SourceMACAddress) and (('{DHCPServer:escapjson}') == "*" or InfobloxHostID in~ ({DHCPServer}))
| distinct SourceMACAddress
| sort by SourceMACAddress asc

parameters.name: IP_Space
parameters.label: IP Space
parameters.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, id_s: string, name_s: string) [];
CommonSecurityLog
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    and DeviceVendor == "Infoblox"
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DHCP"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxIPSpace: string, InfobloxHostID: string) with ( kv_delimiter="=", pair_delimiter=";")
| extend InfobloxHostID = trim(@"\s", InfobloxHostID)
| where (('{DHCPServer:escapjson}') == "*" or InfobloxHostID in~ ({DHCPServer}))
| join kind=leftouter(union isfuzzy=true dummy_table, IP_Space_Info_CL | where TimeGenerated >= ago(365d) | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id_s) on $left.InfobloxIPSpace == $right.id_s 
| extend name_s = trim(@"\s", name_s)
| where isnotempty(name_s)
| distinct name_s
| order by name_s asc

    and DeviceEventClassID == "DHCP-LEASE-DELETE"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxHostID: string, InfobloxLeaseOp: string, InfobloxIPSpace: string) with ( kv_delimiter="=", pair_delimiter=";")

| extend name_s = trim(@"\s", name_s)
| where (('{IP_Space:escapjson}') == "*" or name_s in~ ({IP_Space}))

content.title: Released DHCP Leases

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, id_s: string, name_s: string) [];
CommonSecurityLog
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    and DeviceVendor == "Infoblox"
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" 
    and DeviceEventClassID in ("DHCP-LEASE-CREATE", "DHCP-LEASE-UPDATE")
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxHostID: string, InfobloxLeaseOp: string, InfobloxIPSpace: string) with ( kv_delimiter="=", pair_delimiter=";")
| extend InfobloxHostID = trim(@"\s", InfobloxHostID), SourceHostName = trim(@"\s", SourceHostName), SourceMACAddress = trim(@"\s", SourceMACAddress)
| where (('{DHCPServer:escapjson}') == "*" or InfobloxHostID in~ ({DHCPServer})) 
and (('{MAC:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceMACAddress in~ ({MAC})) 
and (('{HostName:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceHostName in~ ({HostName}))
| join kind=leftouter(union isfuzzy=true dummy_table, IP_Space_Info_CL | where TimeGenerated >= ago(365d) | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id_s) on $left.InfobloxIPSpace == $right.id_s 
| extend name_s = trim(@"\s", name_s)
| where (('{IP_Space:escapjson}') == "*" or name_s in~ ({IP_Space}))
| summarize dcount(SourceIP)

CommonSecurityLog

| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxHostID: string, InfobloxIPSpace: string, InfobloxSubnet: string,

InfobloxFingerprint: string ) with ( kv_delimiter="=", pair_delimiter=";")
| extend InfobloxHostID = trim(@"\s", InfobloxHostID), SourceHostName = trim(@"\s", SourceHostName),

parameters.label: User
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" 
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" 
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "Audit"
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName)
| where isnotempty(SourceUserName)
| distinct SourceUserName
| sort by SourceUserName asc

    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" 
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "Audit"
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName), DeviceAction = trim(@"\s", DeviceAction)
| where isnotempty(DeviceAction) and (('{UserName:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({UserName}))
| distinct DeviceAction
| sort by DeviceAction asc

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" 
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" 
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "Audit"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxHostID: string, InfobloxIPSpace: string, InfobloxSubnet: string, InfobloxRangeStart: string, InfobloxRangeEnd: string, InfobloxLeaseOp: string, InfobloxClientID: string, InfobloxDUID: string, InfobloxLifetime: string, InfobloxLeaseUUID: string, InfobloxFingerprintPr: string, InfobloxFingerprint: string ) with ( kv_delimiter="=", pair_delimiter=";")
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName), DeviceAction = trim(@"\s", DeviceAction)
| where isnotempty(DeviceAction)
| where (('{UserName:escapjson}') == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({UserName})) 
and (('{Action:escapjson}') == "*" or DeviceAction in~ ({Action}))
| project-rename Action = DeviceAction
| summarize Count = count() by Action

parameters.name: User
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox"
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| extend SourceUserName = trim(@"\s", SourceUserName)
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxB1PolicyAction: string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where isnotempty(SourceUserName) and InfobloxB1PolicyAction contains "Block"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SourceUserName
| distinct SourceUserName
| sort by SourceUserName asc

This workbook depends on the **Infoblox-Get-Service-Name** and **Infoblox-Get-Host-Name** logic apps which are deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.</br>
Please configure this logic apps first and keep enabled in order to use this workbook.

parameters.name: ServiceName
parameters.label: Service Name
parameters.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, id_s: string, name_s: string) [];
CommonSecurityLog
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    and DeviceVendor == "Infoblox"
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "Service"
    and isnotempty(AdditionalExtensions)
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxServiceId:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| join kind=leftouter(union isfuzzy=true dummy_table, Service_Name_Info_CL | where TimeGenerated >= ago(365d) | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id_s) on $left.InfobloxServiceId == $right.id_s
| extend name_s = trim(@"\s", name_s)
| where isnotempty(name_s)
| distinct name_s
| order by name_s asc

parameters.name: HostName
parameters.label: Host Name
parameters.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, id_s: string, name_s: string) [];
let dummy_table_2 = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, ophid_g: string, display_name_s: string) [];
CommonSecurityLog
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    and DeviceVendor == "Infoblox"
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "Service"
    and isnotempty(AdditionalExtensions)
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxLogName:string) with (pair_delimiter='|', kv_delimiter='=')
| extend HostID = tostring(split(split(InfobloxLogName, ';')[0], '/')[0])
| parse-kv LogSeverity as (InfobloxLogName:string) with (pair_delimiter=' ', kv_delimiter='=')
| extend LogSeverityHostID = tostring(split(InfobloxLogName, '/')[0])
| extend HostID = iif(isempty(HostID), LogSeverityHostID, HostID)
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxServiceId:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| join kind=leftouter(union isfuzzy=true dummy_table, Service_Name_Info_CL | where TimeGenerated >= ago(365d) | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id_s) on $left.InfobloxServiceId == $right.id_s
| join kind=leftouter(union isfuzzy=true dummy_table_2, Host_Name_Info_CL | extend ophid_g = replace_string(ophid_g, '-', '') |where TimeGenerated >= ago(365d) | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ophid_g) on $left.HostID == $right.ophid_g
| extend HostName = trim(@"\s", display_name_s), name_s = trim(@"\s", name_s)
| where isnotempty(HostName) and ('{ServiceName:escapejson}' == "*" or name_s in~ ({ServiceName}))
| distinct HostName
| order by HostName asc

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, id_s: string, name_s: string) [];
let dummy_table_2 = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, ophid_g: string, display_name_s: string) [];
CommonSecurityLog
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange:value}
    and DeviceVendor == "Infoblox"
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "Service"
    and isnotempty(AdditionalExtensions)
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxLogName:string) with (pair_delimiter='|', kv_delimiter='=')
| extend InfobloxLogName = split(split(InfobloxLogName, ';')[0], '/')
| extend HostID = tostring(InfobloxLogName[0]), Process = tostring(InfobloxLogName[1])
| parse-kv LogSeverity as (msg:string, InfobloxLogName:string) with (pair_delimiter=' ', kv_delimiter='=')
| extend InfobloxLogName = split(InfobloxLogName, '/')
| extend LogSeverityHostID = tostring(InfobloxLogName[0]),
         LogSeverityProcess = tostring(InfobloxLogName[1]),
         Message = split(iif(isempty(Message), msg , Message), '"')[1]
| extend Process = iif(isempty(Process), LogSeverityProcess, Process), HostID = iif(isempty(HostID), LogSeverityHostID, HostID)
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxServiceId: string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| join kind=leftouter(union isfuzzy=true dummy_table, Service_Name_Info_CL | where TimeGenerated >= ago(365d) | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id_s) on $left.InfobloxServiceId == $right.id_s
| join kind=leftouter(union isfuzzy=true dummy_table_2, Host_Name_Info_CL | extend ophid_g = replace_string(ophid_g, '-', '') |where TimeGenerated >= ago(365d) | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ophid_g) on $left.HostID == $right.ophid_g
| extend ['Service Name'] = trim(@"\s", name_s), ['Host Name'] = trim(@"\s", display_name_s), ['Process Name'] = trim(@"\s",Process)
| where ('{ServiceName:escapejson}' == "*" or ['Service Name'] in~ ({ServiceName}))
and ('{HostName:escapejson}' == "*" or ['Host Name'] in~ ({HostName}))
| project-rename ['Date Time'] = TimeGenerated
| project ['Date Time'], ['Service Name'], ['Process Name'], ['Host Name'], Message

This data connector depends on parsers based on Kusto Functions to work as expected called **InfobloxInsight, InfobloxInsightEvents, InfobloxInsightAssets, InfobloxInsightIndicators, **and **InfobloxInsightComments** which are deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

# Infoblox SOC Insights Workbook

##### Get a closer look at your Infoblox SOC Insights. 

This workbook is intended to help visualize your [BloxOne SOC Insights](https://csp.infoblox.com/#/insights-console/insights/open/threats) data as part of the **Infoblox SOC Insight Solution**. Drilldown your data and visualize events, trends, and anomalous changes over time.

---

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(InfobloxInsightID: string, FirstSeen: datetime, ThreatClass: string, ThreatProperty: string, ThreatType: string, FeedSource: string, Priority: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
InfobloxInsight
| distinct InfobloxInsightID, FirstSeen, ThreatClass, ThreatProperty, ThreatType, FeedSource, Priority
| extend isConfigIssue = iff((ThreatClass has_cs ("CONFIGURATIONISSUE")), "Configuration", "Threats")
| summarize count() by isConfigIssue

content.json:
## Using this Workbook
To make use of this workbook, you must ingest Infoblox SOC Insight data into Sentinel in one or both ways:
- Deploy the **Infoblox SOC Insights Data Connector** and forward CEF syslog via the Microsoft forwarding agent.
- Deploy the **Infoblox-SOC-Get-Open-Insights-API** playbook.

You can use one or both at the same time, but beware of duplicate data!

Configure the **Analytic Queries** that come with this Microsoft Sentinel Solution. They will add the Insights as Incidents, so you can easily track and run playbooks on them.

Then, once you have some Insights, run the **Infoblox-SOC-Get-Insight-Details** playbook to get all the gritty details. If you wish, you can then run **Infoblox-SOC-Import-Indicators-TI** to ingest each Indicator of an Insight into Sentinel as **Threat Intelligence**.

## Run playbooks directly from this workbook!

#### Set the **Resource Group**, [**Tenant ID**](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/fundamentals/how-to-find-tenant) and **Playbook** to run when clicking on the **Run Playbook** in the SOC Insight Incidents table below.

**Infoblox-SOC-Get-Insight-Details** pulls all the details about each individual Insight. 

**Infoblox-SOC-Import-Indicators-TI** pushes each Indicator of the Insight into Sentinel as **Threat Intelligence**. You must run the **Infoblox-SOC-Get-Insight-Details** *before* running **Infoblox-SOC-Import-Indicators-TI**.

You will need to run the playbooks for each Insight/Incident. You can do that manually within this workbook with the **Run Playbook** button in the table below, from the **Incidents** blade, or configure them to run automatically with **Analytics**. 

After running **Infoblox-SOC-Get-Insight-Details** on an Insight, **click on it in the table below** to see the details.

**You can rerun playbooks on Insights** that already contain data to get the most recent.

parameters.name: ResourceTypes
parameters.label: Resource Types
parameters.description: This parameter must be set to Logic app.

parameters.name: SentinelResourceGroup
parameters.label: Incidents Resource Group
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type in~ ({ResourceTypes})
| summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId, resourceGroup
| order by Count desc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project resourceGroup

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
where type =~ "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"
| where resourceGroup =~ "{SentinelResourceGroup}"

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId

parameters.name: PlaybookResourceGroup
parameters.label: Playbook Resource Group
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type in~ ({ResourceTypes})
| summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId, resourceGroup
| order by Count desc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project resourceGroup

parameters.name: PlaybookName
parameters.label: Playbook
parameters.description: Set the playbook to run when clicking on the "Run Playbook" in the SOC Insight Incidents table below.
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type in~({ResourceTypes})
| extend resourceGroupId = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', resourceGroup)
| where resourceGroup =~ "{PlaybookResourceGroup}"// or '*' in~({PlaybookResourceGroup})
| order by name asc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project label = tostring(name)

parameters.name: Status
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime {TimeRange:value}
| distinct Status
| sort by Status asc

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime {TimeRange:value}
| where Status in ({Status})
| project Owner=tostring(Owner.userPrincipalName)
| sort by Owner asc
| extend Owner = iff(isnotempty( Owner), Owner, "Unassigned")
| distinct Owner

content.query:
let x =
SecurityIncident
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber
| extend IncidentID = IncidentName
| extend IncidentNumber = toint(IncidentNumber)
| where tostring(Owner.userPrincipalName) in ({Owner}) or (isempty(tostring(Owner.userPrincipalName)) and "Unassigned" in ({Owner}))
| extend RunPlaybook = "Run Playbook"
| where Title has_cs "Infoblox - SOC Insight"
| extend Labels = tostring(Labels)
| extend InfobloxInsightID = extract("InfobloxInsightID: (.*?)\"", 1, Labels)
| join 
    (InfobloxInsight
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by InfobloxInsightID
    ) on InfobloxInsightID
//sometimes duplicate TimeGenerated so grab LastSeen next
| summarize arg_max(LastSeen, *) by IncidentNumber
| project IncidentNumber, Severity, Priority, ThreatType, ThreatClass, ThreatFamily, LastSeen, FirstSeen, FeedSource, EventsCount, NotBlockedCount, BlockedCount, PersistentDate, SpreadingDate, InfobloxInsightID
; 
let incidents =
SecurityIncident
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tostring(IncidentNumber)
| extend IncidentID = IncidentName
| extend IncidentNumber = toint(IncidentNumber)
| where tostring(Owner.userPrincipalName) in ({Owner}) or (isempty(tostring(Owner.userPrincipalName)) and "Unassigned" in ({Owner}))
| extend RunPlaybook = "Run Playbook"
| where Title has_cs "Infoblox - SOC Insight"
| extend Alerts = extract("\\[(.*?)\\]", 1, tostring(AlertIds))
| mv-expand AlertIds to typeof(string)
//----------------
;
let alerts =
    SecurityAlert
    | extend AlertEntities = parse_json(Entities)
    //| extend InfobloxInsightID = tostring(AlertEntities.ObjectGuid)
;
incidents | join alerts on $left.AlertIds == $right.SystemAlertId
//----------------------
| summarize AlertCount=dcount(AlertIds) by IncidentNumber, IncidentID, Status, Title,  Alerts, IncidentUrl, Owner=tostring(Owner.userPrincipalName) , RunPlaybook
// -------------
| join kind=inner (incidents | join alerts on $left.AlertIds == $right.SystemAlertId) on IncidentNumber
| join kind=fullouter x on IncidentNumber
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by (IncidentNumber)
//| where Priority in ({SelectPriority}) or '{SelectPriority:label}' ==  "All"
| where Status in ({Status}) or '{Status:label}' ==  "All"
| project IncidentNumber, Severity, Priority, Title, Status, Owner, IncidentUrl, RunPlaybook, ThreatType, ThreatClass, ThreatFamily, LastSeen, FirstSeen, FeedSource, EventsCount, NotBlockedCount, BlockedCount, PersistentDate, SpreadingDate, InfobloxInsightID, IncidentID
//| project-away IncidentID
| order by toint(IncidentNumber) desc
content.title: SOC Insight Incidents

content.query:
let Lookback = 30d;
// Finding Tops 
let Top = materialize(InfobloxInsightEvents
| where InfobloxInsightID == "{InfobloxInsightID}"
| where Detected >= ago(Lookback)
| where isnotempty(SourceIP)
| summarize count() by SourceIP
| top 20 by count_ 
| project SourceIP);
// Filtering datasource to Tops and Plot Time chart
InfobloxInsightEvents
| where InfobloxInsightID == "{InfobloxInsightID}"
| where Detected >= ago(Lookback)
| where SourceIP in ((Top))
| distinct ThreatLevel, ThreatConfidence, Detected, DestinationDnsDomain, InfobloxDNSQType, ThreatClass, SourceUserName, DeviceName, SourceIP, ThreatProperty, InfobloxB1PolicyName, InfobloxB1PolicyAction, InfobloxB1Network, DNSResponse, DNSView, InfobloxB1FeedName, SourceMACAddress, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion, InfobloxB1DHCPFingerprint, ResponseRegion, ResponseCountry, DeviceRegion, DeviceCountry
| make-series Total= count() default = 0 on Detected from ago(Lookback) to now() step 1d by SourceIP

content.query:
let AssetCount = (InfobloxInsightIndicators
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *), count_distinct(SourceMACAddress) by ThreatIndicator, InfobloxB1PolicyAction
| join kind=inner
(
InfobloxInsightEvents
| where InfobloxInsightID == "{InfobloxInsightID}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by SourceIP, ThreatIndicator
) on $left.InfobloxInsightID == $right.InfobloxInsightID
| where ThreatIndicator1 has_cs ThreatIndicator
| summarize by SourceIP, ThreatIndicator
| summarize ['Unique Asset Count'] = count() by ThreatIndicator);


InfobloxInsightIndicators
| where InfobloxInsightID == "{InfobloxInsightID}"
| where isnotempty(ThreatIndicator)
| where InfobloxB1PolicyAction in ({InfobloxB1PolicyActionParam}) or '{InfobloxB1PolicyActionParam:label}' ==  "All"
| where ThreatLevel in ({ThreatLevelParam}) or '{ThreatLevelParam:label}' ==  "All"
| join
    (
        AssetCount
    ) on ThreatIndicator
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *), count_distinct(SourceMACAddress) by ThreatIndicator, InfobloxB1PolicyAction
| extend URL = strcat("https://csp.infoblox.com/#/security_research/search/auto/", ThreatIndicator, "/summary")
| extend sort_order = case(
    ThreatLevel == "High", 5,
    ThreatLevel == "Medium", 4,
    ThreatLevel == "Low", 3,
    ThreatLevel == "N/A", 2,
    1 // default case if ThreatLevel doesn't match any of the above
)
| order by sort_order, EventCount desc
| project-away sort_order
| project-rename ['Policy Action'] = InfobloxB1PolicyAction, ['Feed Name'] = InfobloxB1FeedName
| project ThreatIndicator, ['Unique Asset Count'], ['Policy Action'], ThreatLevel, ThreatConfidence, ['Feed Name'], ThreatActor, LastSeen, FirstSeen, EventCount, URL

InfobloxInsightEvents
| where ThreatIndicator has_cs '{ThreatIndicator}'
| where InfobloxInsightID == "{InfobloxInsightID}"
| join
(
    InfobloxInsightAssets
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by SourceIP, SourceUserName, SourceMACAddress, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion
) on SourceIP
| order by LastSeen, EventCount desc
| project-rename User = SourceUserName, ['MAC Address'] = SourceMACAddress, ['Source OSVersion'] = InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion, Network = InfobloxB1Network, ['DHCP Fingerprint'] = InfobloxB1DHCPFingerprint
| summarize by SourceIP, User, ['MAC Address'], ['Source OSVersion'], DeviceName, Network, ['DHCP Fingerprint'], Location, EventCount, IndicatorDistinctCount, LastSeen, FirstSeen
content.title: Assets for {ThreatIndicator}

| distinct ThreatLevel, ThreatConfidence, Detected, DestinationDnsDomain, ['Query Type'], ThreatClass, SourceUserName, DeviceName, SourceIP, ThreatProperty, ['Policy Name'], ['Policy Action'], Network, DNSResponse, DNSView, FeedName, SourceMACAddress, ['Source OSVersion'], ['DHCP Fingerprint'], ResponseRegion, ResponseCountry, DeviceRegion, DeviceCountry
| order by Detected desc

This Config Insights depends on the **Infoblox-Config-Insights** and **InfoBlox-Config-Insight-Details** logic apps which are deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.</br>
Please configure this logic apps first and keep it enabled in order to use this Config Insight Details Dashboard.
# Infoblox Config Insights

## Steps to view Config Insights Details using this workbook
- This workbook is intended to view the available config insights and view their details.
- Select the **Resource Group** and **Subscription ID**.
- Select TimeRange.
- From the **Config Insights** panel, select any config Insight.
- You will be able to see the config details of the selected Insight.
- If there is message like **The query returned no results** on config details panel, then click on the **GET CONFIG INSIGHT DETAILS** link to get the Config Insight Details for that Config Insight.
- This will execute the **InfoBlox-Config-Insight-Details** logic app in the background.
- You can check the status of the playbook to identify the Config Insight Details status.
- Click on the refresh button of the lookup panel until you get the Config Insight Details.
</br>
</br>
**Note** : In cases where specific indicators may not have lookup information available in Infoblox, users are advised to refer to the Logic App status for further details.

content.json:
# [Threat Intelligence](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/understand-threat-intelligence)
---

Within a Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) solution like Microsoft Sentinel, the most commonly used form of CTI is threat indicators, also known as Indicators of Compromise or IoCs. Threat indicators are data that associate observed artifacts such as URLs, file hashes, or IP addresses with known threat activity such as phishing, botnets, or malware. This form of threat intelligence is often called tactical threat intelligence because it can be applied to security products and automation in large scale to detect potential threats to an organization and protect against them. In Microsoft Sentinel, you can use threat indicators to help detect malicious activity observed in your environment and provide context to security investigators to help inform response decisions. [Video Demo](https://youtu.be/4Bet2oVODow)
![Image Name](https://azure.microsoft.com/svghandler/azure-sentinel?width=600&height=315)

content.query:
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
// Select all indicators from the table
// Create a new column to identify the type of indicator, IP, Domain, URL, File, or Other
| extend IndicatorType = iif(isnotempty(EmailSourceIpAddress) or isnotempty(NetworkDestinationIP) or isnotempty(NetworkIP) or isnotempty(NetworkSourceIP) or isnotempty(NetworkCidrBlock), "IP",
                        iff(isnotempty(Url), "URL",
                        iff(isnotempty(EmailRecipient) or isnotempty(EmailSenderAddress), "Email",
                        iff(isnotempty(FileHashValue), "File",
                         iff(isnotempty(DomainName) or isnotempty(EmailSourceDomain), "Domain",
                        "Other")))))
// Summarize and order the data, then render the chart
| summarize CountOfIndicators = count() by IndicatorType, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by CountOfIndicators desc 
| render barchart kind=stacked

content.query:
let tiObservables = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
    | where TimeGenerated < now()
    | project IndicatorId, ThreatType, Description, Active, IndicatorTime = TimeGenerated, Indicator = strcat(NetworkSourceIP, NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP, Url, FileHashValue, EmailSourceIpAddress, EmailSenderAddress, DomainName), SourceSystem;
let alertEntity = SecurityAlert 
    | project parse_json(Entities), SystemAlertId , AlertTime = TimeGenerated
    | mvexpand(Entities)
    | extend entity = iif(isnotempty(Entities.Address), Entities.Address,
                      iif(isnotempty(Entities.HostName),strcat(Entities.HostName, ".", Entities.DnsDomain),
                      iif(isnotempty(Entities.Url), Entities.Url,
                      iif(isnotempty(Entities.Value), Entities.Value,
                      iif(Entities.Type == "account", strcat(Entities.Name,"@",Entities.UPNSuffix),"")))))
    | where isnotempty(entity) 
    | project entity, SystemAlertId, AlertTime;
let IncidentAlerts = SecurityIncident
    | project IncidentTime = TimeGenerated, IncidentNumber, Title, parse_json(AlertIds)
    | mv-expand AlertIds
    | project IncidentTime, IncidentNumber, Title, tostring(AlertIds);
let AlertsWithTiObservables = alertEntity
    | join kind=inner tiObservables on $left.entity == $right.Indicator;
let IncidentsWithAlertsWithTiObservables = AlertsWithTiObservables
    | join kind=inner IncidentAlerts on $left.SystemAlertId == $right.AlertIds;
IncidentsWithAlertsWithTiObservables
| where Indicator contains '{Indicator}' or Indicator == "*"
| summarize Incidents=dcount(IncidentNumber), Alerts=dcount(SystemAlertId) by Indicator, ThreatType, Source = SourceSystem, Description
| sort by Incidents, Alerts desc
content.title: Threat Intelligence Alerts
